author: VideoGameLord613
title: Hey, at least it's not Barney
review: This is a free dinosaur to add to your mini collection! Wow! a free dinosaur! They only use one brick for the eyes, however. I just think that's a little silly, and you can't move the legs, either. This, I would recommend it, for $2.99.

author: legoguy2805
title: Triceratops
review:
I got this today with the Daily Mirror. I don't like it very much because it's horns are too far up, there's bricks under it which make it look weird, the tail and head are unrealistic.

Pros:
Stands up well
Good Colour Scheme
Moveable head/headplate

Cons:
Legs don't move
Bricks under body make it look stupid
Tail/head unrealistic

Overall, 3/5

author: legoguy_3000_
title: Free
review:
I got this free with the newspaper.

Pros:
stands up well
good colour scheme
good for a promo
easy to build
yo can rebuild it into a moth(that's what it looks like)

Cons:
small instructions,could get lost
legs can't move

very good for a promo 5/5

author: darthdc
title: OKish dino
review:
Having recently got all 6 SW models from the Mirror promtion, I thought I'd review the models from their previous promotion.

The triceratops is kinda ok - for a small model, it stands out quite well. The only downside is the tail - should be longer.

Other than that, a good selection of bricks

author: tkettle9719
title: This is a dinosaur? Not a wooly mammoth?
review:
I got this set along with eight others in the Mr. Magorium Value Pack. I like this set, but it has some very major problems that subtract in value where it counts: quality.

Pros

  • -The reds in this set are very nice.
  • -The use of the horns is also quite welcome.
  • …

Cons

  • -The black tail is a bit uncreative, as is the transparent green piece, no thought process
  • -The model is very hard to decipher as to what it is.
  • …

I don't have anything against this model, but it has some flaws that are hard to excuse. Buy it at a low price, or not at all.
